dc:title: Msgr. Barry O'Toole
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Eulogizes Msgr. Barry O'Toole, a friend of the Worker since its origins. Remembers him as a talkative teacher, founder of a house of hospitality in Pittsburgh, and defender of the right to be a pacifist and conscientious objector.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 402 1944-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
